attributes.action: Replace Members of Parliament that voted against triggering article 50.
attributes.background: Members of Parliament are elected as representatives of the people of the UK, to go against triggering article 50 is directly AGAINST those they represent. Regardless of how their constituents voted, this country voted  to leave the e.u which must be done by triggering article 50.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
